resources.string: Is this outfit appropriate and professional?
Username must be five or more characters
This password must be eight or more characters
The username or password is incorrect. If you do not have an account, please register
User already exists, please try logging in or choose another username.
This app was created by Andrew Katz, Yi Zhao, and Jack Phillips. \nCopyright Â© 2016 Andrew Katz, Yi Zhao, and Jack Phillips. \nAll Rights Reserved.
Welcome to \"Is this Professional!\" In order to use our app you need to create an account. An internet connection is required.
This is \"Evaluate\" screen, where you help out other users by evaluating pictures and making sure they meet the FBLA guidelines.
Press this button to show that the outfit is professional and meets dress code guidelines
Press this button to show that the outfit is NOT professional and doesn\'t meets dress code guidelines
Press this button to pull up official dresscode guidelines
Press this for hidden actions, including logout
Press this to go back to the rating screen
Press this to leave a helpful comment or suggestion that answers the user\'s question
Press this to go to the next picture and skip leaving a comment
This is the Me screen, where you can upload your own image and view feedback on your own outfits.
Press this to upload a picture or outfit. Note that "Google Camera" is not supported.
